body: Translate this.... pls
Dear Minazuki Juuzou, please return our beloved Menyoujan. We'll pay the ransom.

@YandereWaifu You know I was with you right up until you decided to offer insults.  Tells me you're just trolling.  The shiny plastic looking shading is horrendous.  If you like fucking plastic then there are plenty of onaholes on the market geared just for you.
This reminds me of battlefield V.
i agree Burst lol, no offense to the artist but this one seems really rushed, it's not as polished as the previous ones
I dunno what kinda crack pipe Yandere was hitting a week ago, but that must've been some strong shit. This doesn't even come close to AA4...
happy birthday azunyan!

I've done a more proper analysis between the older Azus@ttacks and this. Her tits are smaller and her ass a lot bigger in this one, so she's closer to the sexualized loli ideal (such as Fate's Jack the Ripper), meaning my previous guess was off. Anyone who likes this less either prefers more "pure" lolis or mostly liked older girls in the first place and just enjoyed this series for whatever reason because of Menyoujan's unique art style.
I maintain that this doujin took far more skill to draw than all previous ones though. A growing Menyoujan or an assistant, this was done by a more talented artist than the one who drew the last four parts. Consider that maybe it just no longer plays to your fetish first before you accuse it of dropping in quality. It's close to GOAT loli content for my dick for the time being.
@YandereWaifu : it looks like only you, right now 90% people here agreed that the art is degraded.

@YandereWaifu unless you're trolling, but look at page 7. Asuza's chest look so fucking manly. Just look at the line across her chest... It looks more like a man's chest. I'm not into gay/transgender stuff, but you might like it I guess! 

Most of us love every work from menyoujan. If you look at his other work, Azusa's the only loli character he worked with.

@WalkerRiley But it IS an improvement, the anatomy and facial expressions have never been better. Azusattack 1-3 had some uncanny valley shit, look at that cowgirl face-forward from 3. The only thing different here is that her extremeties are exaggerated a bit more, the lines of her body's curves are given more accent, and the shading is shinier, all of which get me significantly harder than the previous works. The dick doesn't lie.
Y'all just don't like change, I suspect you're all extreme lolicons and don't like that she's plumper looking in this one.

Yea I doubt this was drawn by menyoujan.  Likely an assistant.

Yandere:  If you think this is an improvement, no one can help you.
Wow, quality went downhill with this one... Azus@ttack used to be my favorite series, but this is borderline garbage.
Two words: Degrading change
Something is odd with its artstyle. As it was drawn by someone else
This is so bad compared to the previous ones...
Sadly enough, I shall notice, that the author's unique style is degrading
W-What happened?

its bad... i am a great fan of this series. every time i see there is a new azus@ttack i stop everything am doing and prepare to fap. this is no exageration, i sometimes only come to this page looking if menyoujan made a new one. but this is bad. only at the cover there is a mistake on her hand. this is by far his worst work. looks like he didnt want to do it or a newbie did it
Seriously, what the fuck happen? the art is too horrible!
What the fuck is wrong with all of you, this is the hottest shit menyoujan has ever drawn. The art got shittier from 3 to 4 if anything, I couldn't even get it off to that one
My boner just died
Is the art getting shitter or what rofl
The doujin is fine, but the change of art seems strange compared to the others.

The art is terrible compared to the other ones! Why are there so many unnecessary lines all over Asuza's body? It's so unattractive... Like, WOW SO HOT! LOOK AT HER STERNUM! LOOK AT HER RIB CAGE/DIAPHRAGM! The lines are so visible it's like her body was a figma figurine.
Doujins that open with sex are usually below average. That was exactly the case here.
it looks like different artist under the same circle

this is clearly a different artist and the cover art looks the same as the one frin atzusattack 2 but in worse. come on what the fuck is this dude the art is awful, it is uninspired and low quality. there isn't even a cool setting like in the other ones or any backgrounds at all, i fucking hate this
That was pretty hot, but I wish this artist would do something else considering how rarely he draws new stuff.
oh cool, a 5th one. thought the artist would stop at 4 seeing as how long ago that was.
Welp, time to binge all the prior ones.
Today is a good day
